casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Kenneth CONYERS. No. 156P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 6, 2006. R. Marcus Lodge, Robert C. Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney Generals, Kathleen U. Baldwin, Assistant Attorney General, Roxann Vaneekhoven, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 20th day of March 2006 by Defendant for "Petition for Discretionary Review":

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 6th day of April 2006."
